author: David Moye
title: Trevor Noah Sums Up Trump's Press Conference: 'What A Putz!'

organizations.name: white house tell us everything reaction pics from within trump

text:
02/17/2017 12:44 am ET Trevor Noah Sums Up Trump's Press Conference: 'What A Putz!' "You have a president of a democracy who thinks press is only valid when they ask him easy questions." By David Moye 
Like many people, Trevor Noah is still shocked by President Donald Trump ’s wacked-out press conference on Thursday. 
Not so much for the words that came out of the president’s mouth as for the message implied by his responses. 
“You have a president of a democracy who thinks press is only valid when they ask him easy questions,” Noah said Thursday on “The Daily Show.” “Questions that he likes. In fact, in his mind, he deserves it.” 
Noah then summed up what millions of people are thinking right now: “What a putz!” ALSO ON HUFFPOST Reaction Pics From Within Trump's White House Tell Us Everything Reaction Pics From Within Trump's White House Tell Us Everything 1
